item.title: Building guide
item.description: Step by step installation process of a building. This guide of installation of a building will help us to know how to build small to large scale category building by self. PRINCIPLES OF ARCHITECTURE A building is an assemblage that is firmly attached to the ground and that provides SYSTEMS DESIGN AND ANALYSIS Systems design comprises a logical series of steps that leads to the best TRADITIONAL CONSTRUCTION PROCEDURES Systems design of buildings requires a different approach to design and
